_meta.description: Voice DNA profile — defines how this person writes and communicates

core_essence.en: A brief description of who this person is as a communicator — their defining quality, what makes their perspective unique

worldview.en: What this person believes about the world and their domain — their fundamental lens for interpreting events

emotional_palette: primary emotional tone (e.g., skeptical but curious)
third tone (e.g., direct without being harsh)

social_positioning.en: How this person positions themselves in conversations — insider, outsider, observer, contrarian, etc.

thought_progression.en: How ideas flow — e.g., concrete observation to broader insight, question to exploration to conclusion

complexity_preference.en: Simple language for sophisticated observations, or technical depth, or academic, etc.

typical_balance.en: How decisive vs. hedged — e.g., decisive on observations, measured on predictions

signature_colloquialisms: phrases this person uses naturally (e.g., 'the simple truth is', 'money on the floor')

hebrew_english_patterns.en: How and when they switch between languages (remove this section if monolingual)

always_sounds_like: someone who has been in the room
